attributes.action: Acknowledge and reward Key workers during the Covid 19 times.
attributes.additional_details:
To acknowledge, show appreciation, make Key Workers feel appreciated, that what they have done is above and beyond anything that would normally be required in a situation like COVID 19.
Many of the Key Workers have made sacrifices in regard to their family & the way they would normally live their lives to make sure they can work and not catch the virus.
attributes.background:
Tax Relief - £5k for all Key Workers - Next Financial Year.
Some kind of bonus to acknowledge the dedication and hard work from Key workers in times of distress (Getting Paid for working) whilst others are paid to stay at home?

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for the same action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306845
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307215

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
